title: True Beauty
author: Yaongyi
synopsis: Jugyeong Lim masters makeup to transform her appearance and navigate high school life, but struggles to keep her true self hidden.

title: Who Made Me a Princess
author: Plutus
synopsis: A girl is reincarnated as a princess in a tragic novel and must change her fate to avoid her destined death.

title: Light and Shadow
author: Ryu Hyang
synopsis: A maid marries a duke while hiding her secret identity as royalty, leading to unexpected twists and romance.

title: Let's Play
author: Montpellier
synopsis: A game developer struggles with social anxiety and unexpected romantic interests as she navigates the gaming industry.

title: A Good Day to be a Dog
author: Lee Hey
synopsis: After a kiss from her true love, a woman cursed to turn into a dog every night must find her happiness.

title: Something About Us
author: Lee Yun-ji
synopsis: Two close friends slowly realize their feelings for each other, but face challenges in moving from friendship to romance.

title: My Dear Cold-Blooded King
author: lifelight
synopsis: A common girl is caught in a web of lies and schemes when she meets a mysterious king known for his cold heart.

title: Siren's Lament
author: Instantmiso
synopsis: A girl finds herself in a love triangle between two sirens and learns about love, sacrifice, and the secrets of the ocean.

title: Age Matters
author: Enjelicious
synopsis: A 29-year-old woman and a 21-year-old CEO enter a contract relationship that leads to unexpected romantic feelings.

title: I Love Yoo
author: Quimchee
synopsis: Shin-Ae, a girl who avoids love, finds herself in complicated relationships with two brothers who have very different personalities.
